subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which was the first capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के पहले राजधानी क्या था?
explanation_en:
Udaipur was the first capital of Rajasthan.
राजस्थान के पहले राजधानी उदयपुर थी।
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के पहले राजधानी उदयपुर थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the most famous example of Rajasthani architecture?

question_en: Which palace was built by the Sultan of Mewar?
question_hi: Mewar समीत समीत समीत समीत समीत शरिमध्या समित
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as Hawa Mahal, was built by the Sultan of Mewar.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the builder of the City of Jaipur?
explanation_en: Amber, also known as Jaipur, was built by Maharaja Amber.
